abstract: Ed Miliband, leader of Britain's opposition Labour Party, begins campaigning for prime minister in tightly contested election that could have wide ranging effects on country.
lead_paragraph: Ed Miliband, leader of the opposition Labour Party, began his campaign on Friday to become Britain’s next prime minister.

headline.main: Britain: Labour Leader Starts Bid for Prime Minister
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Labour Leader Starts Bid for Prime Minister

snippet: Ed Miliband, leader of the opposition Labour Party, began his campaign on Friday to become Britain’s next prime minister.
